mapper.select: select 'FOLLOW' as event_type, f.follower_id as actor_user_id, u.nickname as actor_nickname, u.profile_image as actor_profile_image, f.followee_id as recipient_user_id, null as post_id, null as comment_id, f.created_at as created_at from follows f join users u on u.user_id = f.follower_id where f.followee_id = #{recipientUserId} order by f.created_at desc

select 'LIKE' as event_type, l.user_id as actor_user_id, u2.nickname as actor_nickname, u2.profile_image as actor_profile_image, ue.user_id as recipient_user_id, l.post_id as post_id, null as comment_id, l.created_at as created_at from likes l join posts p on p.post_id = l.post_id join user_emotions ue on ue.user_emotion_id = p.user_emotion_id join users u2 on u2.user_id = l.user_id where ue.user_id = #{recipientUserId} order by l.created_at desc

select 'COMMENT' as event_type, c.user_id as actor_user_id, u3.nickname as actor_nickname, u3.profile_image as actor_profile_image, ue2.user_id as recipient_user_id, c.post_id as post_id, c.comment_id as comment_id, c.created_at as created_at from comments c join posts p2 on p2.post_id = c.post_id join user_emotions ue2 on ue2.user_emotion_id = p2.user_emotion_id join users u3 on u3.user_id = c.user_id where ue2.user_id = #{recipientUserId} order by c.created_at desc
